about_the_game:
Give your retro heroes calming places to call home with the Summerwind Saga - Interior pack! ELV Games is back with a new tileset series with a cute pixel art style filled with all the furniture your villages could need to make inns, shops, and warehouses for your players to visit and explore. A2, A4, and A5 tiles along with 3 B sheets of brown furniture (with 3 variations of the wooden pieces in a green shade) and a B sheet of extra rugs and doorways offer up a bunch of details to help you make each house unique while still fitting into the general village vibes.

Each sheet comes in two sizes so you can easily use them in both your Ace or MV/MZ projects, or use them in your favorite engine! Check out the Summerwind Saga - Interior pack and build cozy homes filled with wooden furniture for your farming hero to return to at night!

Content:

- 10 total tile sheets (including color variants)!
- Multiple ground, wall, carpets tiles
- Wood Boxes, Flags
- Vases, Wardrobes, Cabinets
- Stairs, Doors
- Treasure Chest
- Lots of props to create your Interiors!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
